attributes.action: Make those British Subjects who support non-EU migration legally responsible.
attributes.additional_details:
There are many British Subjects in Britain that want our government to open its borders to economic non-EU migrants and there are many British Subjects that don’t want our government to open its borders to allow more non-EU migrants into Britain.

It is not fair on those British Subjects who do not want our government to open its borders to non-EU migrants to house and financially support their stay in Britain through the tax system.
attributes.background: The government should set up a register for all those British Subjects wanting our government to open our country’s borders to non-EU migrants to register their names on the register then become legally responsible to house and financially support the non-EU migrants.
